__TOC__

Throughout the early weeks in January the CanadianTeam and OhioTeam experimented with various WebRTC clients and services: https://chatb.org/ubuntu-ca , Jitsi, !OpenMeeting, and finally Google Hangouts.

* 22 January 2014 - <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-ca/2014-January/010242.html|Video Chat for Ubuntu Canada, Thu 23 Jan, 7pm EST]]</nowiki> (Mailing list)
* 23 January 2014 - <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-ca/2652/detail/|Video Chat Meeting]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[CanadianTeam-Meetings-2014-2014-01-23|Agenda and Minutes]]</nowiki>)
